title: Shocking Pink
description: Three girls shared one dark secret -- but this one wasn't theirs to keep.  Fifteen years ago, Andie, Julie and Raven saw something they shouldn't have.  In an abandoned house, two lovers were engaged in a deadly sexual game.  The girls couldn't stop watching -- until the woman was found murdered. Now they can't stop remembering, because whoever did the killing is determined to make them forget what they saw -- forever. .
author: Erica Spindler
